messages.title: The Choice Is Clear
messages.content: We need a local champion who will fight for Herefordshire.

mentions.candidate: Sarah Carr is our local champion.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Conservative candidate is a former director of Barclays Bank.
mentions.partyLeader: Paul Keetch is backing Sarah Carr

issues.education: Sarah Carr has a real record of action for us; she has campaigned against school closures, against post office closures and for more police on the street.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sarah Carr lives here with her family and has a real record of action for us; she has campaigned against school closures, against post office closures and for more police on the street.

contactInformation.address: Freepost, Hereford House, 20 East Street, Hereford, HR1 2LU

endorsements.endorsement: is backing Sarah Carr to be our next MP.

images.caption: Sarah Carr with supporters in Herefordshire.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet criticizes the Conservative candidate for his background as a former director of Barclays Bank and points out the spending of Â£17m on new offices while slashing vital local services.
